post.text: We are one nation. When one state hurts, we all hurt. We must all work together - to lift each other up. -DJT

comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: And the photo ID must be given with proof of a Legal Birth Certificate. If I had to give my Birth Certificate (I am white, born 1940 in Iowa) then all should have to show a Certified legal Birth Certificate to obtain a Legal Photo ID.

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Which is why 'registering' to vote should NEVER be as simple as getting a drivers license.

replies.author: Collin
replies.text: Christopher so we should make it more difficult?

replies.author: Marissa
replies.text: ID is not difficult, but needs to be a part of our life, something we can show to prove we are who we say we are..
